entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning before morning. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 9:15 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 9:15 PM PST Friday 03 February 2023
